reqs:
Pre-reqs: Either (a) a score of 68% or higher in MATH 120 or (b) a score of 80% or higher in one of MATH 100, MATH 102, MATH 104, MATH 180, MATH 184. (or (c) a score of 5 in AP Calculus AB.)
This is an Honours course. Prerequisite: Either (a) a score of 68% or higher in MATH 120 or (b) a score of 80% or higher in Math 100, MATH 102, MATH 104, MATH 180, or MATH 184 or (c) a score of 5 in AP Calculus AB or (d) permission of Undergraduate Chair. Please email the Undergraduate Chair, at ugradchair@math.ubc.ca, to register, quoting your UBC student number.
The SIS will enforce automatically prerequisites for this course. Students will not be able to register themselves if they do not have the correct prerequisites. If you need to get your UBC file updated with qualifications such as Transfer Credits, take care of that by sending documentation to admissions.inquiry@ubc.ca.
description: Definite integrals and the Fundamental Theorem of Calculus, techniques and applications of integration, infinite series. Please consult the Faculty of Science Credit Exclusion List: www.students.ubc.ca/calendar/index.cfm?tree=12,215,410,414.
